name: ThoughtsAndPrayers
description:
For many years now America has been plagued by mass shootings. Now it is time to fight back, using the power of THOUGHTS and PRAYERS.

Deploy Thoughts and Prayers tactically in order to combat mass shootings and limit the number of deaths. You will need to tailor your usage of Thoughts and Prayers to the type of shooter and their weapon to be most effective. As you do this you will gain experience in Thoughts and Prayers, which you can use to upgrade your Thoughts and Prayers powers. Additionally, the common citizenry will come to your aid, and with their outrage focused through their elected leaders they will let you pass Reforms to give you additional advantages. Good luck!

Feature List:
  • Thoughts
  • Prayers
  • Outrage
  • Stunning visuals
